name: Super Goomy World!
description:
A small 3d Platformer where you can run through a level filled with Coins, Enemies and Controllable Rotating  Platforms to help you progress through the level faster. Try and score the best time and leave it in the comments! I would even love to see your video on how you achieved your time!

This is a small free 3d platformer project I made while trying to learn programming to help with my other projects. Its pretty janky and also geared towards speed running.

Controls:

W, A, S, D: Walk

Left Shift: Sprint

Left Ctrl: Fast Fall / Crouch

I, O, P: Rotate Floating Platforms
